interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Elli K Essential Sincerity From AZ Time Reverse Double Ampoule – Made in USA - Double Layering Serum – Repairing & Deep Hydrating – Oil and Cream Formula for Healthy and Smooth Skin, (2.02 fl.oz.)
Review Date: 2022/09/22
Store: ELLI K
Average Rating: 3.7
Product Details: {'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating,Anti-aging', 'Use for': 'Face', 'Scent': 'Banana', 'Brand': 'ELLI K', 'Package Dimensions': '5.24 x 1.93 x 1.73 inches; 5.29 Ounces', 'UPC': '841960174819'}
Review Text: This face lotion is packaged well. When you push the top it mixes two different types of products to create the ultimate moisturizing face lotion. It absorbs quickly into your skin and leaves your skin looking and feeling fresh.
Review Title: Comes and really nice packaging
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
2Pcs Summer Crystal Sequins Unicorn Girl Alligator Hair Clips (Holo+Pome Purple)
Summer Crystal
{'Brand': 'Summer Crystal', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Material': 'Polyester, Cotton', 'Unit Count': '2.00 Count', 'Number of Pieces': '2', 'Product Dimensions': '3.25 x 2.75 x 0.75 inches; 0.63 Ounces', 'UPC': '635638430488'}
There are two sparkling unicorn hair accessories with alligator clips included in this set. They are good quality and handmade. They are easy to stick into thin hair for any little girl to enjoy. I love the sparkle and the girlyness of these hair clips!
Cute!
Eggplant Clearing Cleansing Oil Pad 60 pads, Makeup remover pad. Exfoliating. Simple easy quick wipe. Moisturizing cleansing oil pad
PAPA RECIPE RIGHT FOR SKIN
{'Brand': 'PAPA RECIPE RIGHT FOR SKIN', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '3.98 x 3.82 x 2.72 inches; 10.86 Ounces'}
These oil removing and make up removing wipes work well! There are 60 pads in this container. It also comes with a plastic tweezers so you can remove one pad without touching all the rest of the pads with your fingers. The lid flips open for easy daily access.
Moisturizing
Gold Collagen Under Eye Patches Mask for dark circles and puffiness by Levitural - Golden Eye Bags Treatment - Mother's Day Gift for Women
LV Levitural
{'Brand': 'LV Levitural', 'Item Form': 'Mask', 'Product Benefits': 'Moisturizing,Hydration', 'Scent': 'Rose', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Package Dimensions': '3.25 x 3.25 x 1.6 inches; 5.61 Ounces', 'UPC': '766234785310'}
I love how sparkly these eye masks are! It’s soothing and helps to reduce wrinkles under your eyes. There’s a little spatula that comes with this so you don’t have to use your fingers to dig in the jar to get that I am ask. It’s good quality and I recommend it!
Sparkly!
invisibobble Pink Ball Hair Ties with Coil, TWINS Prima Ballerina - Ponytail Holder - No Damage, Wrap and Twist - Pain-Free Hair Accessories for Girls and Women - Gentle for Girls Teens and Thick Hair
invisibobble
{'Color': 'Prima Ballerina', 'Item Form': 'Spiral', 'Brand': 'Invisibobble', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '1.97 x 0.87 x 1.85 inches', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Language': 'Spanish', 'Product Dimensions': '1.97 x 0.87 x 1.85 inches; 0.32 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'IB-TW', 'Manufacturer': 'invisibobble'}
The pictures on this product make it seem like you can use this bobby hair tie in a ponytail. This is not true. My hair is very thin and with any type of hair tie I have to tie it at least three times. I cannot make this hair clip wrap around and stay wrapped around my thin ponytail. I can do this at the end of a braid with less hair. It is cute but it is difficult to make it stay closed.
Difficult to make this stay closed
invisibobble Pink Ball Hair Ties with Coil, TWINS Prima Ballerina - Ponytail Holder - No Damage, Wrap and Twist - Pain-Free Hair Accessories for Girls and Women - Gentle for Girls Teens and Thick Hair
invisibobble
{'Color': 'Prima Ballerina', 'Item Form': 'Spiral', 'Brand': 'Invisibobble', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '1.97 x 0.87 x 1.85 inches', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Language': 'Spanish', 'Product Dimensions': '1.97 x 0.87 x 1.85 inches; 0.32 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'IB-TW', 'Manufacturer': 'invisibobble'}
The pictures on this product make it seem like you can use this bobby hair tie in a ponytail. This is not true. My hair is very thin and with any type of hair tie I have to tie it at least three times. I cannot make this hair clip wrap around and stay wrapped around my thin ponytail. I can do this at the end of a braid with less hair. It is cute but it is difficult to make it stay closed.
Cannot stay closed around a ponytail
AOA Studio Collection Makeup Sponge Set Makeup Blender Latex Free and High-definition Set of 5 Makeup Blender For Powder Cream and Liquid, Super Soft Wonder Blender Beauty Cosmetic Beveled
AOA STUDIO
{'Brand': 'AOA STUDIO', 'Color': 'Ivory', 'Material': 'Rubber', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Makeup', 'Package Dimensions': '6.85 x 5.39 x 1.97 inches; 1.45 Ounces', 'UPC': '850022931338'}
These make up blenders are soft and great for applying foundation. They don’t absorb too much of the foundation and they help to apply it in an even way. Part of the proceeds go to help animals and need which is nice. They are also made in Texas. They are easy to clean and reuse.
Great for applying foundation
WING Fly Grl Mane-Taming Gel Wand 8ml
Wing
{'Hair Type': 'All', 'Liquid Volume': '8 Milliliters', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Brand': 'Wing', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '4.27 x 0.74 x 0.74 inches; 0.63 Ounces', 'UPC': '810023041894'}
I have tried hair flyaway gel before that comes with a mascara wand but this one comes with a wand that looks like it would go to a lipgloss. I feel like the wand itself makes it messier to apply because you are just rubbing it on your hair instead of brushing it to catch all the flyaways. The gel itself works well but you just have to apply a little more pressure with the wand to get it to go where you want to go.
Good hold
BABOR Power Serum Ampoule: Beta Glucan | Calms, Strengthens, Soothes | 2D Hyaluronic Acid & Microsilver | Clean & Vegan | Visible Results in 7 Days
Babor
{'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Product Benefits': 'Instantly calms, strengthens & soothes complexion while providing intense hydration. Visible results in 7 days.Instantly calms, strengthens & soothes complexion while providing intense hydration. Visible results in 7 days.  See more', 'Scent': 'Aloe', 'Brand': 'Babor', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '3.39 x 0.91 x 5.83 inches; 2.12 Ounces', 'Item model number': '400699'}
This serum helps to reduce redness and irritation on skin. This is a week long supply and you use one vial a day. It definitely helps to clean up your skin.
Helps to reduce redness
Dry Weightless Hair Volume and Texture Spray | Dry Texture Spray for Hair | Texturizing Spray | Sulfate and Cruelty Free 244ml (7oz)
Osensia
{'Hair Type': 'All, Dry, Fine', 'Liquid Volume': '7 Fluid Ounces', 'Brand': 'Osensia', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Unit Count': '7.0 Fl Oz', 'Package Dimensions': '8.03 x 1.93 x 1.89 inches; 8.78 Ounces', 'UPC': '850001832274'}
I have thin, fine hair. This texture spray helps to add volume to my hair. Spray at the roots on dry hair and massage in. The scent is nice and it does it’s job!
Helps to add volume
LSxia LX1101-3
LSxia
{'Brand': 'LSxia', 'Finish Type': 'Glitter,Shimmer,Natural', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Unit Count': '2.00 Count', 'Coverage': 'Light', 'Package Dimensions': '5.28 x 0.94 x 0.71 inches; 0.07 Ounces'}
I really like this eye shadow color. It goes on smooth. If you don’t use an eye shadow primer, it may crease so keep that in mind for all day wear.
Use with eye primer
Elli K Essential Sincerity From AZ Time Reverse Double Ampoule – Made in USA - Double Layering Serum – Repairing & Deep Hydrating – Oil and Cream Formula for Healthy and Smooth Skin, (2.02 fl.oz.)

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Style Preferences:** The user enjoys sparkly and playful accessories, including beauty products that convey a whimsical, youthful aesthetic appealing to all ages.

- **Target Audience:** Their focus remains on products designed for children while simultaneously attracting adults, reflecting a love for youthful charm across demographics.

- **Quality and Craftsmanship:** The user continues to value well-designed items that balance aesthetics and functionality. They prioritize reliable performance in self-care and beauty products, demonstrating a discerning eye for quality.

- **Functionality:** Practicality is paramount, especially for beauty items intended for sensitive skin. Their recent experiences underscore expectations for products to deliver as advertised, with a focus on efficient application.

- **Consumables and Self-Care:** The user maintains a strong affinity for self-care products that provide hydration and soothing benefits, emphasizing convenience and hygiene alongside effective results. They appreciate innovative packaging that enhances usability.

- **Recent Sentiment:** Fun aesthetics and performance in beauty and self-care products are highly valued. The user is committed to supporting brands with positive causes, like animal welfare, and seeks products that integrate functional applicators. Recent interactions suggest they are particularly interested in hydrating solutions that absorb quickly and improve skin texture, aligning with their desire for quick-absorbing, effective formulations that enhance their self-care routine.
